item.title: Send Memory Utilization Metrics to CloudWatch
item.description: Below reviews 2 ways to collect extra metrics from an ec2 instance and send to cloudwatch. The first is a procedural, quick n dirty way. The second is the aws preferred way using the cloudwatch agent & agent configuration. This advice is not production ready but just to get your feet wet. Quick ‘n Dirty This is a setup for Ubuntu but pretty much everything should transfer to RHEL based. The idea is to have a cron job execute a script that checks free memory then use aws-cli to write to cloudwatch.
